segments.text: How do I look ? I love these braids . They're fun !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They look great ! Hey , are you hungry ? I know a good Ethiopian restaurant-Meskerem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: An Ethiopian restaurant ? Whoa ! I always think of starving people in Ethiopia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's very “ in ” these days . Some of the places are really expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's so ironic ! Well , what's it like ? Is it your traditional food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Africans and African-Americans are different in many ways . Our food's different , too .
segments.speaker: S2
